article_title: What Hamas and Israel are saying.
sentence: The            Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  more  than  100  Palestinians  were            killed  while  waiting  for  aid  to  be  delivered  in  the  north  of  the  Strip.

article_title: What Hamas and Israel are saying.
sentence: Meanwhile,  an  IDF  statement  said  residents  surrounded  aid  trucks  prior  to  the  incident  and  "looted  supplies",  and  dozens  were  killed  as  a  result  of  "pushing,  trampling  and  being  run  over  by  the  trucks"  Videos  posted  on  social  media  showed  casualties  loaded  onto  emptied  aid  lorries  and  a  donkey  cart.
